value:
$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Ah!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Now, I see...$k$pI have devoted myself to you,
so I can tell you this now,
$Nu...$k$pAlfonse's fate...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Eir...?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My mother's goal is to destroy the
kingdom of Askr.$k$pWhat I did not know is who she
would target first. But now I
understand...$k$pIt pains me to say it, but Prince
Alfonse, you will die.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|See? Death has come for you.
Look now...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Who—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|I am death...and I come to all
who live.$k$pTake my hand and slumber...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You are Hel—ruler of the dead!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Did...did we win?$k$pIt was too easy... Has she escaped?
Stay alert! Search the area!$k$p

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Doomed boy.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You—
$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,128,0,128,255|$Fi2000|$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|A curse in the name of Hel, ruler of
the dead...$k$pIn nine days, your life will end.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What...?
$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,128,0,128,255|$Fi2000|$k$pHahh...I...I can't...breathe...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hahh... Hahh... This feeling...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Your fate cannot be changed. The
cohort of the dead has expanded...
You are doomed, boy.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|By the prince's side—now!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Useless.$k$pThere is no defeating death. There is
no escaping death. I am she.$k$pCount your days, mortals, and quake
in terror.$k$pDeath is one step behind you. All of
you. Always. I will see you again...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Gah—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Nine days.$k$p$Sbs150|
